Thank you very much for indicating the kind of interest
NAEB has in the Radio and Recordings Committee. We will
contact Gertrude Broderick and Gale Adkins concerning
their membership on the Committee.
I regret that I will be unable to attend the IERT Committee
meeting in Columbus. Some personnel changes in the office
are in process which make my leaving at that time impossible.
ERNEST TIEMANN
Director, Visual Instruction Bureau,
University of Texas
